title: Fast and Easy Israeli Tahini Cookies

instructions.1: Preheat oven to 355 degrees F (180 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with waxed paper.
instructions.2: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder together in a large bowl; add butter and tahini and mix until dough is crumbly. Roll dough into small balls and press each ball into a flattened cookie shape using your palms. Arrange cookies in the prepared baking sheet and press with a fork.
instructions.3: Place the baking sheet on the middle rack of the oven and bake until cookies are golden, about 10 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheet for 2 to 3 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the cookies from Step 2 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is cookies from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is flattened cookie shape from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
